name: Threats 2
description:
Nothing to see here... Move along
Everyone's got a dark secret, chummer. See that chromed-out razorgirl with the shain of fetishes? She could be a cultist who uses blood rituals to restore her lost magic. See that suit slugging down whiskey in the corner? He could be the errand-boy of some supra-governamental conspiracy to overthrow the NANs. And that freak behind you? Drek, chummer, he's not even human...
